query:
SELECT 
  td.id as dep_id,
  td.taskId,
  t1.name as task_name,
  td.dependsOnTaskId,
  t2.name as depends_on_name,
  td.dependencyType,
  td.createdAt
FROM task_dependencies td
JOIN tasks t1 ON td.taskId = t1.id
JOIN tasks t2 ON td.dependsOnTaskId = t2.id
WHERE t1.name IN ('Login erfolgreich', 'Plattform nutzen', 'oasdk')
   OR t2.name IN ('Login erfolgreich', 'Plattform nutzen', 'oasdk')
ORDER BY td.createdAt ASC

  td.taskId,
  t1.name as task_name,
  td.dependsOnTaskId,
  t2.name as depends_on_name,
  td.dependencyType,
  td.createdAt
FROM task_dependencies td
JOIN tasks t1 ON td.taskId = t1.id
JOIN tasks t2 ON td.dependsOnTaskId = t2.id
WHERE t1.name IN ('Login erfolgreich', 'Plattform nutzen', 'oasdk')
   OR t2.name IN ('Login erfolgreich', 'Plattform nutzen', 'oasdk')
ORDER BY td.createdAt ASC
